description: Complete system overview documenting the core architecture, key components, and high-level workflow of the macdefaultbrowser tool
Detailed documentation of the Launch Services API integration, including browser querying, identification, and setting algorithms
Documentation of the bundle identifier transformation logic, mapping rules, and case-insensitive matching algorithms
Technical details of the automated dialog confirmation system, including AppleScript integration and interaction flow
Comprehensive documentation of data flow between components, including browser query results, user input processing, and system interactions
